business.name: Anmol Wholesale
business.tagline: From Our Restaurant Kitchen to Yours
business.description: Sweden's trusted B2B wholesale supplier for restaurants, grocery stores, and caterers. Backed by Anmol Sweets & Restaurant's culinary expertise.

faqs.question: What is Anmol Wholesale?
faqs.answer: Anmol Wholesale is Sweden's trusted B2B wholesale supplier for restaurants, grocery stores, and caterers. We're backed by 5+ years of experience running Anmol Sweets & Restaurant in Stockholm. We specialize in authentic Indo-Pak products, bulk ingredients, and manufacture the Anmol Electric Tandoor.

faqs.question: Do you deliver to my location?
faqs.answer: Yes! We deliver across Sweden and all of Europe. **Stockholm area** gets same-day delivery via our own fleet. **All of Sweden** gets 1-2 day delivery. **Nordic countries** (Norway, Denmark, Finland) take 2-4 days. **EU countries** take 3-10 days depending on location. Free shipping thresholds apply!

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept: **Card payments** (Visa, Mastercard via Stripe), **Swish** for Swedish customers, **Cash on Delivery** for Stockholm pickups, and **Invoice (Net 28)** for approved business accounts. Business customers can also apply for credit terms.

faqs.question: How do I place a bulk order?
faqs.answer: You can place orders through our website, use our **Quick Order** feature for fast bulk ordering, or contact us directly at wholesale@restaurantpack.se. For large orders, we recommend creating a business account for wholesale pricing and invoice payment options.

faqs.question: Do you have minimum order requirements?
faqs.answer: No, we don't have a minimum order requirement! You can order any amount. However, wholesale pricing and free shipping thresholds apply for larger orders. Business account customers get access to special pricing tiers.

faqs.question: How can I get wholesale pricing?
faqs.answer: Register for a **Business Account** on our website. Once verified, you'll get access to wholesale pricing, invoice payment options, and dedicated account management. Visit [/wholesale/register](/wholesale/register) to apply.

faqs.question: What is the Anmol Electric Tandoor?
faqs.answer: The **Anmol Mini Electric Tandoor** is our flagship product - manufactured by us in Stockholm! It's a compact, professional-grade tandoor oven perfect for restaurants, cafes, and bakeries. It makes authentic naan, roti, and tandoori dishes. We offer it at 15% lower prices than competitors since we're the direct manufacturer.

faqs.question: Are your products halal?
faqs.answer: Yes! We prioritize **halal-certified** products for our meat and food items. Our products are sourced to meet the requirements of halal-conscious restaurants and customers.

faqs.question: Can I visit your warehouse?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our warehouse is located at **Fagerstagatan 13, 163 53 Spånga, Sweden**. You can visit during business hours for ex-warehouse pickup and better rates. Contact us to arrange a visit.

faqs.question: What shipping options are available for Stockholm?
faqs.answer: For **Stockholm area**, we offer same-day delivery using our own delivery fleet. Pickup from our Spånga warehouse is also available with ex-warehouse pricing. This is the fastest and most economical option!
